text: right Cloaks is a 1998 role-playing game supplement for Over the Edge published by Atlas Games. ==Contents== Cloaks is a sourcebook for secret agents. ==Reception== The reviewer from the online second volume of Pyramid stated that "if you do have the other material, Cloaks is one of the most intriguing books in this long running series. Tweet has taken some major stylistic leaps in this book. Cross-reference Cloaks with the other key titles and the GM is going to have a field day." ==Reviews== *Shadis #48 (June, 1998) ==References== Category:Role-playing game books
